mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_search (job_content_title, job_content, job_genre, job_art_title, job_start_date, job_production_date, job_to, job_field, job_gender, job_contact, job_view, job_deadline, user_id, created_at) VALUES (#{jobContentTitle}, #{jobContent}, #{jobGenre}, #{jobArtTitle}, #{jobStartDate}, #{jobProductionDate}, #{jobTo}, #{jobField}, #{jobGender}, #{jobContact}, #{jobView}, #{jobDeadline}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE job_search SET job_content_title = #{jobContentTitle}, job_content = #{jobContent}, job_genre = #{jobGenre}, job_art_title = #{jobArtTitle}, job_start_date = #{jobStartDate}, job_production_date = #{jobProductionDate}, job_to = #{jobTo}, job_field = #{jobField}, job_gender = #{jobGender}, job_contact = #{jobContact}, job_view = #{jobView}, created_at = NOW() WHERE job_content_title = #{jobContentTitle} AND user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT j.job_id, j.job_content_title, j.job_content, j.job_genre, j.job_art_title, j.job_start_date, j.job_production_date, j.job_to, j.job_field, j.job_gender, j.job_contact, j.job_view, j.job_deadline, j.created_at, u.user_id, u.user_nickname, u.user_profile_img FROM job_search j LEFT JOIN user u ON j.user_id = u.user_id WHERE j.job_id=#{jobSearchId}
